card.name: A-Earthquake Dragon
card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of Dragons you control not named A-Earthquake Dragon.Flying, trample{2}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Return A-Earthquake Dragon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: A-Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
card.text: When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, if you don't control a creature named Boo, create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.

card.name: A-Sepulcher Ghoul
card.text: Sacrifice another creature: Sepulcher Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Air-Cult Elemental
card.text: FlyingWhirlwind — When Air-Cult Elemental enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Alaundo the Seer
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand and put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. It gains "When the last time counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until end of turn." Then remove a time counter from each other card you own in exile.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Assassin
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Mastermind
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Scout
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, perpetually gets +1/+1.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Swashbuckler
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Thief
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, a creature of your choice an opponent controls perpetually gets -1/-0.

card.name: Alora, Rogue Companion
card.text: Specialize {2}Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Ambergris, Agent of Balance
card.text: HasteWhenever Ambergris, Agent of Balance attacks, you may discard your hand and draw two cards. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control, where X is the number of cards you've discarded this turn.

card.name: Ambergris, Agent of Destruction
card.text: HasteWhenever Ambergris, Agent of Destruction attacks, you may discard your hand and draw two cards. If you do, Ambergris deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of cards you've discarded this turn.

card.name: Ambergris, Agent of Law
card.text: HasteWhenever Ambergris, Agent of Law attacks, you may discard your hand and draw two cards. If you do, other creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards you've discarded this turn.

card.name: Ambergris, Agent of Progress
card.text: HasteWhenever Ambergris, Agent of Progress attacks, you may discard your hand and draw three cards.

card.name: Ambergris, Agent of Tyranny
card.text: HasteWhenever Ambergris, Agent of Tyranny attacks, you may discard your hand and draw two cards. When you do, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards you've discarded this turn.

card.name: Ambergris, Citadel Agent
card.text: HasteSpecialize {3}Whenever Ambergris, Citadel Agent attacks, you may discard your hand and draw two cards.

card.name: Ambition's Cost
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Ambitious Dragonborn
card.text: Ambitious Dragonborn enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control and creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Ancient Brass Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Brass Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put any number of target creature cards with total mana value X or less from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the result.

card.name: Ancient Bronze Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Bronze Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on each of up to two target creatures, where X is the result.

card.name: Ancient Copper Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Copper Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. You create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the result.

card.name: Ancient Gold Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Gold Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. You create a number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to the result.

card.name: Ancient Silver Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Silver Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. Draw cards equal to the result. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

card.name: Arcane Archery
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach and trample until end of turn.You get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter, reach counter, and trample counter on it."

card.name: Archivist of Oghma
card.text: FlashWhenever an opponent searches their library, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Armor of Shadows
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: Ascend from Avernus
card.text: Return all creature and planeswalker cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile Ascend from Avernus.

card.name: Astarion, the Decadent
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelinkAt the beginning of your end step, choose one —• Feed — Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn.• Friends — You gain life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

card.name: Baba Lysaga, Night Witch
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice up to three permanents: If there were three or more card types among the sacrificed permanents, each opponent loses 3 life, you gain 3 life, and you draw three cards.

card.name: Bag of Holding
card.text: Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

card.name: Baldur's Gate
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{2}, {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of other Gates you control.

card.name: Baleful Beholder
card.text: When Baleful Beholder enters the battlefield, choose one —• Antimagic Cone — Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment.• Fear Ray — Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Band Together
card.text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

card.name: Basilisk Collar
card.text: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.Equip {2}

card.name: Battle Cry Goblin
card.text: {1}{R}: Goblins you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.Pack tactics — Whenever Battle Cry Goblin attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: Belt of Giant Strength
card.text: Equipped creature has base power and toughness 10/10.Equip {10}. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is the power of the creature it targets.

card.name: Black Dragon
card.text: FlyingAcid Breath — When Black Dragon enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Black Market Connections
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, choose one or more —• Sell Contraband — Create a Treasure token. You lose 1 life.• Buy Information — Draw a card. You lose 2 life.• Hire a Mercenary — Create a 3/2 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. You lose 3 life. (It has every creature type.)

card.name: Blood Money
card.text: Destroy all creatures. For each nontoken creature destroyed this way, you create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Blur
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.Draw a card.

card.name: Boareskyr Tollkeeper
card.text: When Boareskyr Tollkeeper enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals all creature and land cards in their hand. Choose one of them. That card perpetually gains "This permanent enters the battlefield tapped."

card.name: Bonecaller Cleric
card.text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice Bonecaller Cleric: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Breath Weapon
card.text: Breath Weapon deals 2 damage to each non-Dragon creature.

card.name: Bronze Walrus
card.text: When Bronze Walrus enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.){T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Calim, Djinn Emperor
card.text: FlyingWard {2}Calim's Breath — {1}{U}, Discard Calim: Tap up to one target nonland permanent. Draw a card. Then you may exile two other cards named Calim, Djinn Emperor from your graveyard. When you do, return Calim, Djinn Emperor from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.When you discard Calim, conjure a card named Calim, Djinn Emperor into your library seventh from the top.

card.name: Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. If that mana is spent on a Dragon creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Cast Down
card.text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.

card.name: Catti-brie of Mithral Hall
card.text: First strike, reachWhenever Catti-brie of Mithral Hall attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Equipment attached to it.{1}, Remove all +1/+1 counters from Catti-brie: It deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of counters removed this way.

card.name: Celestial Unicorn
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Celestial Unicorn.

card.name: Chain Devil
card.text: Animate Chains — When Chain Devil enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a nontoken creature.

card.name: Champions of Tyr
card.text: FlyingDouble teamWhen Champions of Tyr enters the battlefield you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter, a flying counter, or a lifelink counter on it."

card.name: Chaos Balor
card.text: FlyingWhenever Chaos Balor attacks or dies, choose two. Each mode must target a different player.• Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then seeks that many nonland cards.• Chaos Balor deals 2 damage to target player and they create two Treasure tokens.• Chaos Balor deals 2 damage to each creature target player controls. Those creatures perpetually get +2/+0.

card.name: Chardalyn Dragon
card.text: Flying

card.name: Charmed Sleep
card.text: Enchant creatureWhen Charmed Sleep enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Choose Your Weapon
card.text: Choose one —• Two-Weapon Fighting — Double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.• Archery — This spell deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Circle of the Land Druid
card.text: When Circle of the Land Druid enters the battlefield, you may mill four cards. (You may put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)Natural Recovery — When Circle of the Land Druid dies, return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Circle of the Moon Druid
card.text: Bear Form — As long as it's your turn, Circle of the Moon Druid is a Bear with base power and toughness 4/2. (It loses all other creature types.)

card.name: Clever Conjurer
card.text: Mage Hand — {T}: Untap target permanent not named Clever Conjurer. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Contact Other Plane
card.text: Roll a d20.1—9 | Draw two cards.10—19 | Scry 2, then draw two cards.20 | Scry 3, then draw three cards.

card.name: Craving of Yeenoghu
card.text: Enchant creature you controlEnchanted creature gets +3/+2, has haste, and attacks each combat if able.{R}: Return Craving of Yeenoghu from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to target creature you control. Craving of Yeenoghu perpetually gains "Enchanted creature gets -1/-1." Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Dawnbringer Cleric
card.text: When Dawnbringer Cleric enters the battlefield, choose one —• Cure Wounds — You gain 2 life.• Dispel Magic — Destroy target enchantment.• Gentle Repose — Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Deadly Dispute
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Demogorgon's Clutches
card.text: Target opponent discards two cards, mills two cards, and loses 2 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

card.name: Devoted Paladin
card.text: Beacon of Hope — When Devoted Paladin enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Displacer Kitten
card.text: Avoidance — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, exile up to one target nonland permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Draconic Lore
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Dragon.Draw three cards.

card.name: Draconic Muralists
card.text: When Draconic Muralists dies, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Dragon's Fire
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand or choose a Dragon you control.Dragon's Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you revealed a Dragon card or chose a Dragon as you cast this spell, Dragon's Fire deals damage equal to the power of that card or creature instead.

card.name: Dragonborn Immolator
card.text: {1}{R}: Dragonborn Immolator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.Gift of Tiamat — When Dragonborn Immolator dies, not its power. You get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +X/+0, where X is the noted number."

card.name: Dragonborn Looter
card.text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Dream Fracture
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card.Draw a card.

card.name: Drider
card.text: ReachWhenever Drider deals combat damage to a player, create a 2/1 black Spider creature token with menace and reach.

card.name: Druid of the Emerald Grove
card.text: When Druid of the Emerald Grove enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two basic land cards and reveal them, then roll a d20.1—9 | Put those cards into your hand, then shuffle.10—19 | Put one of those cards onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.20 | Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Druidic Ritual
card.text: You may mill three cards. Then return up to one creature card and up to one land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of Dragons you control.Flying, trample{2}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Return Earthquake Dragon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of cards in their graveyard.

card.text: Target creature gets -11/-11 until end of turn.

card.text: Farideh's Fireball deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Roll a d20.1—9 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each player.10—20 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Favored Enemy
card.text: As Favored Enemy enters the battlefield, note the most prevalent creature type in an opponent's library.When Favored Enemy enters the battlefield, target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.Whenever a creature an opponent controls of the noted type dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Flames of Moradin

card.text: When Flaming Fist Duskguard enters the battlefield, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +1/+0."

card.name: Flaming Fist Officer
card.text: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Flaming Fist Officer.

card.name: Follow the Tracks

card.name: Fraying Line
card.text: When Fraying Line enters the battlefield, put a rope counter on target creature you control.At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {2}. If they do, they put a rope counter on a creature they control. Otherwise, exile Fraying Line and each creature without a rope counter on it, then remove all rope counters from all creatures.

card.name: Gale's Redirection
card.text: Exile target spell, then roll a d20 and add that spell's mana value.1—14 | You may cast the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.15+ | You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except the token has flying and it isn't legendary if that creature is legendary.

card.name: Jaded Sell-Sword
card.text: When Jaded Sell-Sword enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, it gains first strike and haste until end of turn.

card.text: When Kalain, Reclusive Painter enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. card.text: {T}: Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains haste.

card.text: Exile all nontoken creatures you control, then roll a d20.1—9 | Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.10—20 | Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control, then exile them again. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Lantern of Revealing

card.name: Lapis Orb of Dragonkind

card.name: Liara of the Flaming Fist
card.text: At the beginning of each combat, each creature you control get +1/+1 until end of turn if it has the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard.{1}{R}{W}: Another target nontoken creature you control gains first strike and double team until end of turn. card.name: Mace of Disruption

card.text: Whenever an enchanted creature attacks one of your opponents, it gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.Whenever an Aura you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast that card.

card.name: Mephit's Enthusiasm
card.text: Mephit's Enthusiasm deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If excess damage was dealt this way, note that excess damage, then you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +x/+0, where X is the noted number."

card.name: Meteor Golem

card.name: Mind Spike
card.text: Target opponent reveals each noncreature, nonland card in their hand. You choose a card revealed this way. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life. If they didn't reveal a card this way, you draw a card.

card.name: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes

When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.

card.name: Minthara of the Absolute
card.text: Starting intensity 0Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is Minthara of the Absolute's intensity.Whenever one or more permanents you control leave the battlefield, perpetually increase Minthara's intensity and the intensity of cards named Minthara of the Absolute in your hand, graveyard, and library by 1. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Mirror of Life Trapping
